content: d artagnan socks by caoua coffee materials 390yds/360m 450yards/420m fingering weight sock yarn needles us1 / 2 25mm or size needed to obtain gauge tapestry needle size men s small medium gauge 34 sts / 46 row= 4 inches in pattern abbreviations k = knit stitch k2tog = knit 2 together kfb = knit into front and back of stitch p = purl stitch p2tog = purl 2 together rs = right side / public side sl yb = slip_stitch as if to purl with yarn in back back = the side away from you sl yf = slip_stitch as if to purl with yarn in front front = the side closest to you ssk = slip 1 knit wise slip 1 purl wise knit both stitches together through the back loops st s = stitch es ws = wrong side / private side 2/2 lc = 4 stitch left leaning cable approaching from the back insert the tip of the right needle into the back of the 3rd and 4th stitch on the left needle drop 4 sts off the left needle and pick up the 2 loose stitches from the front with the left needle transfer 2 stitches back from right needle to left needle k4 2/2 rc = 4 stitch right leaning cable approaching from the front insert the tip of the right needle into the 3rd and 4th stitch on the left needle as if to purl drop 4 sts off the left needle and pick up the 2 loose stitches from the back with the left needle transfer 2 stitches back from right needle to left needle k4 ©caoua coffee 2013 pattern is for non-commercial personal use only all rights reserved d artagnan v 1 page 1/4 d artagnan socks - by caoua coffee pattern cuff loosely cast on 60 72 sts and join to begin working in the round work k2 p2 ribbing for 11 14 rounds leg setup for smaller size only work the next 2 row as follows round 1 * kfb kfb p3 kfb p2 k2 p2tog k2 p kfb p kfb p k repeat from * around round 2 * k p k2 p7 k2 p k2 p7 k repeat from * around then k1 p1 this shifts the new beginning of the round by 2 sts to the left now you have 72 sts on the needles for larger size only work the next 2 row as follows round 1 * k2 p2 kfb kfb p2 k2 p2tog repeat from * around round 2 * k2 p4 kfb p3 k2 p repeat from * around now you have 84 sts on the needles continue for both sizes leg start working the leg pattern attention the 2 stitches between the red lines are worked for the larger size only repeat each chart line 3 times to complete one round on your needles work rounds 1-4 of leg pattern 13 15 times all together or until the leg is as long
